SECTION_CONTENT:
Biodegradation factor: 1. readily biodegradation. Log P(w/o): -0,74. No bioaccumultion is to be expected. Harmfull effect on aquatic
organisms. Toxicity: Fish: L. macrochirus LC50: 15400 mg/l/96h. Daphnia: Daphnia magma EC50: > 1000 mg/l/48h. Algea: Sc.
quadricanda IC5: 8000 mg/l/8d. Bacteria: Ps. putida EC5: 6600 mg/l/16h. Protozoa: E. sulcatum EC5: 10000 mg/l/72h. Toxic for fish.
BOD5: 1,12 g/g, COD: 1,50 g/g, ThOO: 1,5 g/g. Do not allow to enter waters, waste water or soil!
